item.title: 瑞典 10 月份住房价格涨势好于往年
item.description: 瑞典国有银行瑞典储蓄银行（SBAB）的数据显示，瑞典房价在 10 月份保持温和回升，这是北欧国家房地产市场典型的疲软月份。【原文：Swedish home prices maintained their modest recovery in October, a typically weak month in the Nordic country’s housing market, according to data from state-owned bank SBAB.】

item.title: 西班牙努力应对造成数百人死亡的洪灾
item.description: 山洪暴发三天后，瓦伦西亚省东部的一个小镇乌蒂尔（Utiel）被洪水席卷，志愿者们在废墟中跋涉，帮助清理破碎的家具，铲走泥土。【原文：Three days after flash floods swept through Utiel, a tiny town in the eastern province of Valencia, volunteers trudged through debris to help clear broken furniture and shovel away mud.】

item.title: 马斯克驳回前推特首席执行官离职诉讼的申请败诉
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在 2022 年接管推特公司（Twitter Inc.【原文：Elon Musk was dealt a significant setback in a court fight over his purge of Twitter Inc.’s top executives when he took over the company in 2022.】

item.title: 失宠的三箭公司创始人妻子出售价值 3800 万美元的新加坡豪宅
item.description: 加密货币对冲基金三箭资本（Three Arrows Capital）倒闭，其联合创始人朱苏（音译）的妻子以 5100 万新元（约合 3850 万美元）的价格成功出售了她在新加坡拥有的一栋豪宅，尽管法院对这对夫妇的其他一些资产实施了冻结。【原文：The wife of Zhu Su, the co-founder of collapsed cryptocurrency hedge fund Three Arrows Capital, has managed to sell a mansion she owns in Singapore for S$51 million ($38.5 million), despite a court-imposed freeze against some of the couple’s other assets.】

item.title: 美国监管机构拒绝亚马逊-塔伦核电协议
item.description: 联邦能源管理委员会（Federal Energy Regulatory Commission）拒绝了一项允许亚马逊公司（Amazon Inc.com）数据中心直接从宾夕法尼亚州核电厂获取电力的协议。【原文：The Federal Energy Regulatory Commission rejected an agreement that would have allowed an Amazon Inc.com data center to directly tap into power from an Pennsylvania nuclear plant.】

item.title: 波音银行家攫取高达 3 亿美元的集资费用
item.description: 就在美国大选前股市发行开始降温之际，波音公司 200 多亿美元的增资为四家银行带来了丰厚的回报。【原文：Boeing Co.’s $20 billion-plus capital raise delivered four banks a hefty payday just as equity market issuance began to cool ahead of the US election.】

item.title: 英伟达在道琼斯工业平均指数中的排名将取代英特尔
item.description: 人工智能热潮的核心芯片制造商英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Nvidia Corp., the chipmaker at the heart of the artificial intelligence boom, is joining the oldest of Wall Street’s three main equity indexes.】

item.title: 罗素指数改革后，价值 7 万亿美元的基金面临重新洗牌
item.description: 随着富时罗素（FTSE Russell）采用新规则限制最大股票对其一些最受欢迎基准的影响，明年超过 7 万亿美元的股票基金将面临大洗牌。【原文：More than $7 trillion of equity funds are poised to face a big reshuffling next year as FTSE Russell adopts new rules to limit the influence of the largest stocks on some of its most popular benchmarks.】

item.title: 康卡斯特聘请摩根士丹利为有线电视网络分拆提供顾问服务
item.description: 康卡斯特公司（Comcast Corp. ）本周宣布考虑剥离有线电视网络业务，据熟悉内情的人士透露，该公司正与投资银行摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）合作评估有线电视网络的各种选择。【原文：Comcast Corp. is working with investment bank Morgan Stanley to evaluate options for its cable networks, according to people familiar with the matter, after announcing this week it’s considering divesting the business.】

item.title: 就在欧佩克考虑增加供应之际，大型石油公司调高了产量增速
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp.）和雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp.【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. and Chevron Corp. capped Big Oil earnings season by revealing blockbuster increases in fossil fuel production — just as OPEC and its allies are preparing to increase the supply of crude into the global market.】

item.title: 惠誉上调埃及评级，财政改革初见成效
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）自 2019 年以来首次上调了埃及的信用评级，这是在获得 570 亿美元的全球救助后，埃及经济摆脱两年危机的最新举措。【原文：Egypt’s credit rating was upgraded by Fitch Ratings for the first time since 2019, the latest boost for the economy emerging from two years of crisis after securing a $57 billion global bailout.】

item.title: 土耳其今年第二次获得 S&P 信用评级升级
item.description: S&P 全球评级公司今年第二次上调了土耳其的信用评级，理由是储备积累和通货紧缩。【原文：Turkey’s credit rating was upgraded by S&P Global Ratings for the second time this year, citing reserve accumulation and disinflation.】

item.title: 破产太阳能公司 Lumio 将以 400 万美元加股票的价格出售资产
item.description: 太阳能安装商 Lumio Holdings Inc. 周五获得美国破产法院批准，将其业务出售给 Zeo Energy Corp.【原文：Solar installer Lumio Holdings Inc. won US bankruptcy court approval on Friday to sell its business to Zeo Energy Corp., saving the company from liquidation demanded by some creditors.】

item.title: 特斯拉出售由太阳能设备贷款支持的 4.99 亿美元债务
item.description: 特斯拉公司出售了 4.99 亿美元的债券，这些债券由向购买太阳能设备的客户提供的贷款支持。【原文：Tesla Inc. sold $499 million of bonds backed by loans offered to customers buying solar equipment.】

item.title: 华尔街事件风险高企 市场为坏消息做准备
item.description: 对于受到鸽派央行、经济扩张和通胀消退支撑的市场来说，11 月伊始的消息是它们变得多么脆弱。【原文：For markets bolstered by dovish central banks, expanding economies and receding inflation, the news as November begins is how vulnerable they’ve become.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克的 X 公司在更新政治广告披露方面落后了
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司在政治广告披露方面滞后，这使得外界更难了解政客和政治行动委员会如何利用社交网络影响即将到来的大选。【原文：Elon Musk’s X is lagging behind on its political advertising disclosures, making it harder for outsiders to understand how politicians and PACs are using the social network to influence the upcoming election.】

item.title: 交易员在关键的美国大选前推升美元看涨押注
item.description: 对冲基金和其他投机交易商预计，大选对避险资产需求的潜在影响以及关税的走向，将使美元进一步反弹。【原文：Hedge funds and other speculative traders are positioned for a further a rally in the dollar as speculative traders anticipate the election’s potential implications on demand for haven assets and the path for tariffs.】

item.title: Shore Capital 与银湖就 86 亿美元宠物护理交易进行谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由贾斯汀-伊什比亚（Justin Ishbia）领导的私募股权投资公司 Shore Capital Partners 正在与银湖管理公司（Silver Lake Management）进行谈判，希望通过一笔 86 亿美元的交易将两家兽药集团合并。【原文：Shore Capital Partners, the private equity firm led by Justin Ishbia, is in talks with Silver Lake Management to partner to combine two veterinary groups through an $8.6 billion deal, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: Corus Entertainment 委托 Jefferies 探讨潜在出售事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，加拿大电视公司 Corus Entertainment Inc. 正与杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group）合作，探讨出售其业务。【原文：Canadian television company Corus Entertainment Inc. is working with Jefferies Financial Group to explore a sale of its business, according to people with knowledge of the situation.】

item.title: 美国称假移民投票视频是俄罗斯的宣传品
item.description: 美国官员周五发表声明称，两段看似虚假地显示投票舞弊和政治腐败的视频是由亲俄组织制造的。【原文：Two videos that falsely appeared to show voting fraud and political corruption were manufactured by pro-Russian groups, according to a statement Friday from US officials.】

item.title: 特朗普的世界自由公司将主要向美国以外的投资者出售数字代币
item.description: 世界自由金融公司（World Liberty Financial）是美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）正在推动的加密货币项目，该公司披露，其发行的 3 亿美元代币主要在海外市场销售，迄今只有不到 350 名美国投资者购买了这种数字资产。【原文：World Liberty Financial, the crypto project being promoted by former President Donald Trump, disclosed that its $300 million offering of tokens is primarily being marketed offshore, with fewer than 350 US investors buying the digital asset so far.】

item.title: 政府政策让 "变地为房 "变得更加昂贵
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: Dish 债券持有人将反驳公司最新的债务交换要约
item.description: Dish Network Corp. 债权人计划否决这家美国卫星电视供应商修订后的债券交换要约。【原文：Dish Network Corp. creditors plan to reject the US satellite-television provider’s revised bond-exchange offer, approval of which is needed for the company’s proposed acquisition by rival DirecTV to occur.】

item.title: 两家基金为争夺一顶有争议的皇冠展开激烈角逐
item.description:
杠杆水平在吸引投资者方面发挥着越来越重要的作用

Leverage levels are playing an increasingly important role in attracting investors

】

item.title: Meta 在英国用户数据集体诉讼案中败诉
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司试图挑战英国的一项集体诉讼，但以失败告终。该集体诉讼指控 Facebook 滥用其支配地位并利用其用户的个人数据。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. failed in a bid to challenge a class action suit in the UK that alleged Facebook abused its dominant position and exploited its users personal data.】

item.title: 监狱医疗保健公司 Wellpath 准备申请破产
item.description: 据知情人士透露，全美最大的监狱医疗服务提供商之一 Wellpath Holdings Inc.【原文：Wellpath Holdings Inc., one of the largest providers of health-care services to prisons and jails across the US, is preparing to file for bankruptcy after struggling with an elevated debt load and high labor costs, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 宾夕法尼亚州选举官员为投票前的 "一切 "做好准备
item.description:
该州已做好应对潜在问题的准备，但州务卿称选举是安全可靠的。【原文：

The state is prepared for potential problems, but secretary of state says elections are ‘safe and secure.’

】

item.title: 马克-拉斯里的大道资本公司为影响力基金寻找买家
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在美国最大的公共养老基金之一对该投资组合失去兴趣后，Avenue Capital Group 正在为其影响力投资业务寻找买家。【原文：Avenue Capital Group is seeking a buyer for its impact investing business after one of the biggest US public pension funds lost interest in the portfolio, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美联储逆回购使用量自 2021 年以来首次降至 1,550 亿美元
item.description: 自 2021 年 5 月以来，投资者停放在美联储主要机构的资金首次降至 2,000 亿美元以下，这重新引发了关于决策者能在多长时间内从美国金融体系中撤走现金而不引发流动性紧缩的争论。【原文：The amount of money investors park at a major Federal Reserve facility dropped below $200 billion for the first time since May 2021, reinvigorating debate over how long policymakers can remove cash from the US financial system without trigging a liquidity crunch.】

item.title: 龙腾世纪》新游戏开发过程一波三折
item.description:
EA旗下的BioWare工作室负责人表示，《龙腾世纪：面纱护卫队》在漫长的制作周期中得到了EA的大力支持

。【原文：

The studio head of EA’s BioWare says ‘Dragon Age: The Veilguard’ received nothing but support from EA throughout its lengthy production cycle

】
